title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack marketplace built with Go, PostgreSQL, and HTMX. Real-time inventory management and payment processing.

title: Microservices Architecture
description: Designed and implemented scalable Go microservices with gRPC and REST APIs. Includes service discovery, load balancing, and centralized logging.

title: API Gateway
description: High-performance API gateway handling 10k+ requests per second. Built with Go and Redis for caching and rate limiting.

title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: WebSocket-based chat app with user authentication, message persistence, and typing indicators. Built with Go backend and React frontend.

title: Task Management CLI
description: Command-line task manager with local storage, reminders, and priority sorting. Written in Go with Cobra framework.

title: Authentication Service
description: OAuth2 authentication microservice with JWT tokens, refresh tokens, and social login integration (Google, GitHub).
